org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins

Class NativeJsPluginHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.NativeJsPluginHelper

  • @JsType(isNative=true,
        name="CharbaJsPluginHelper",
        namespace="<global>")
final class NativeJsPluginHelper
extends Object
    This is a Java native object which is wrapping a CHARBA java script object implementation with some utilities to manage CHART.JS plugins.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
